VEvil.​GameLogic.​Attack.​AAttackModule
MonoBehaviour
public abstract
VEvil.​GameLogic.​Attack.​AAttackModule
VEvil.​GameLogic.​Units.​UnitAttackModule

AAttackModule bring the ability to attack an entity who have a AHealthModule component.

If there's a TeamIndicator placed right next to a AAttackModule component, the Team field will be automatically bind and follow its events.

Variables
maxFailedDistance
private int maxFailedDistance

The maximum failed distance errors this AAttackModule can have.

currentFailedDistance
private int currentFailedDistance

The actual number of distance checks error encountered on the current Target.

isInAttackCooldown
private bool isInAttackCooldown

Is the attack cooldown currently active ?

isInDetectionCooldown
private bool isInDetectionCooldown

Is the detection cooldown currently active ?

public AttackSettings Settings {
get;
set
}

The AttackSettings used by this AAttackModule.

private protected 
set
}

OnAwakeModule
protected virtual void OnAwakeModule()

OnAwakeModule is called when an enabled script instance is being loaded.

OnStartModule
protected virtual void OnStartModule()

OnStartModule is called on the frame when a script is enabled just before any of the Update methods are called for the first frame.

OnEnableModule
protected virtual void OnEnableModule()

OnEnableModule is called when the object becomes enabled and active.

OnDisableModule
protected virtual void OnDisableModule()

OnDisableModule is called when the behaviour becomes disabled.

OnDestroyModule
protected virtual void OnDestroyModule()

Destroying the attached Behaviour will result in the game or Scene receiving OnDestroy.

OnUpdateModule
protected virtual void OnUpdateModule()

OnUpdateModule is called every frames.

OnFixedUpdateModule
protected virtual void OnFixedUpdateModule()

Frame-rate independent MonoBehaviour.FixedUpdate message for physics calculations.

OnLateUpdateModule
protected virtual void OnLateUpdateModule()

OnLateUpdateModule is called every frame, if the Behaviour is enabled.

OnTargetEscaped
protected virtual void OnTargetEscaped()

Called when the target this AAttackModule got escaped for too long.

OnAttack
protected virtual void OnAttack()

Called when this AAttackModule attacks the target.

OnTargetDead
protected virtual void OnTargetDead()

Called when this AAttackModule has killed the target.

OnTargetFound
protected virtual void OnTargetFound()

Called when this AAttackModule found a target.

IsTargetInAttackRange
private bool IsTargetInAttackRange()

Returns true if the Target is still inside the Settings's attack range.

private bool IsTargetInSeeRange()

Returns true if the Target is still inside the Settings's see range.

private void AttackTarget()

Tries to attack the Target previouly set.

CheckForTarget
private void CheckForTarget()

Project a Physics.OverlapSphere(Vector3, float) to check for potential enemies with a AHealthModule component.
